introduction_content: Welcome to the Parallel Corpus Project developed by the University of Science, VNU-HCM. Our platform provides and builds high-quality bilingual datasets to support research in machine translation and multilingual natural language processing, including English, Vietnamese, Chinese, and more. We aim to create an open, accessible resource that encourages collaboration and development within the research community.
usage_guide_content: To use the system, you can follow these steps:
usage_step_1: 1. Upload corpus files: Click 'Select files' to upload two parallel corpus files. Ensure the files are in '.txt' format.
usage_step_2: 2. View sample data: If you don't have corpus files, you can click 'View sample data' to use available sample files.
usage_step_3: 3. Analyze data: Use tools like word search, word classification, named entity recognition (NER), and statistics to analyze the data.
usage_step_4: 4. Switch interface mode: You can switch between light and dark modes by clicking the sun or moon icon in the top-right corner.
no_valid_data: No valid data found in the file
missing_input: Please enter a keyword to search
